name: Burglars, Inc. (itch)
description:
"Burglars, Inc. is a riveting story-driven puzzler filled with badass characters and explosively exciting heist based challenges." - Reviewed by iFanzine.com - 4.5 out of 5 stars

Burglars, Inc. is a brand new indie puzzle game built from scratch for the iOS by the two-man indie team, Fuzzy Orbit Games. Join Chase and her burglar friends as they operate in a crooked city on the outskirts of the law, determined to to steal back what has been taken, one job at a time. Be quick, be careful, or you'll be busted!

  • Experience a brand new type of puzzle game, built from scratch for the iOS
  • Follow an original story driven caper about a group of burglars out to do good
  • 200 unique puzzles to beat - crack safes, pick locks, hack computers, and more
  • Gear up with the latest tools and gadgets to help nab trophies and cash
  • 50 ranks to gain and 30 achievements to unlock in over 15 hours or more of gameplay
  • No ads and no micro transactions - try the first 4 episodes for free (hours of content)!
